DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop evaluate adaptive goal set feedback intervention ( Adaptive Interventions ) promote physical activity behavior compare static physical activity intervention ( Static Interventions ) use two level goal setting ( Adaptive Goals vs. Static Goals ) two level reinforcement procedure ( Praise/Rewards No Praise/Rewards ) 2 x 2 factorial randomize controlled trial . All four group receive intervention via semi-automated text message system develop investigator study team . The primary aim study : 1 . Evaluate whether adaptive intervention result great change physical activity ( pedometer-measured steps/day ) compare static Intervention group . HYPOTHESES : Participants adaptive intervention increase steps/day participant Static Intervention group . The Adaptive Goals Reinforcement Group outperform 3 group . The secondary aim study : 2 . Evaluate effectiveness adaptive static goal intervention improve anthropometric , cardiovascular fitness , cardiometabolic risk factor . HYPOTHESES : Participants adaptive intervention show great improvement fitness , lean fat body mass , serum biomarkers participant Static Intervention group . The Adaptive Goals Reinforcement Group outperform 3 group . 3. assess participant ' satisfaction overall program .
DOC.brief_title: A Walking Intervention Through Text Messaging
DOC.criteria: woman men races/ethnicities live Maricopa County , Arizona . 18 60 year old currently exceed physical activity recommendation determine International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ short form ) . medical condition base Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire Everyone ( PARQ+ ) require supervised physical activity take medication ( ) would prohibit moderate intensity physical activity program body mass index 25 55 kg/m2 currently pregnant plan become pregnant next 4 month plan leave Maricopa County 10 day next 4 month plan move Maricopa County next 4 month currently another physical activity , diet , weight loss program ( e.g . weight watcher ) access Microsoft Windows ( XP , Vista , 7 , 8 ) Mac ( 10.5+ ) operate system computer USB port daily basis daily access email internet mobile phone text message capability willing send receive 35 text message per day .
